{{#if product.warranty}} {{{product.warranty}}} {{/if}}
{{{region name="product_custom_ingredients"}}}
{{#each product.custom_fields}} {{#if name '==' "Ingredient"}} {{#if value '===' "Giloy"}}

Giloy

Helps in controlling extreme blood sugar fluctuations. Also known as Guduchi, Giloy is an Ayurvedic creeper plant/herb that has anti-inflammatory properties.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Ashwagandha"}}

Ashwagandha

A well known Ayurvedic herb, it increases stamina and improves muscle strength. It also has calming properties that may help combat stress.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Tulsi"}}

Tulsi

Tulsi is a prominent Ayurvedic herb that can be used to alleviate infections and allergies. It is also used to treat eye diseases.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Wheatgrass"}}

Wheatgrass

We make sure our wheatgrass is harvested on the 8th day so that the chlorophyll content is the maximum. Wheatgrass is a well-known detoxifier and it also supports digestion by boosting metabolism.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Aloe Vera"}}

Aloe Vera

Aloe Vera is an Ayurvedic herb, very well-known for providing skin benefits. It helps in skin hydration, has anti-inflammatory properties, and boosts overall skin health.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Amla"}}

Amla

Amla, also known as Indian Gooseberry, is a rich source of Vitamin C that helps in improving digestion & metabolism. It is a well-known immunity-booster that fights infections and promotes weight management.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Shilajeet"}}

Shilajeet

Shilajit is sourced from the higher altitudes of the Himalayan mountains. It is a wonderful ingredient to boost stamina and revitalize your body.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Plant Protein"}}

Plant Protein

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Apple Cider Vinegar"}}

Apple Cider Vinegar

Apple Cider Vinegar has been used in Ayurveda since centuries. ACV has multiple health benefits ranging from helping in weight management to keeping the heart-healthy.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Karela"}}

Karela

Relished for its diabetes regulation benefits and despised for its bitter taste, Karela or Bitter Gourd is beneficial for regulating blood sugar levels. It has a compound called Polypeptide-P which acts like Insulin.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Garcinia"}}

Garcina

Garcinia suppresses your appetite and makes you feel full. It also blocks the production of new fat in your body.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Noni"}}

Noni

Noni is a small evergreen tree found in India that often grows among lava flows. It helps reduce inflammation in lungs and also has antibacterial and immunity-boosting properties.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Moringa"}}

Moringa

Moringa or Drumstick has been used as a medicinal plant as it has antifungal and antibacterial properties.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Neem"}}

Neem

Neem has been used in traditional Ayurvedic processes for treating indigestion, supporting improved eyesight, fighting skin disorders using fresh Rajasthani Neem leaves (no dry leaves are used)

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Honey"}}

Honey

Procured from the dense forests of the Himalayan foothills, unfiltered wild honey works as a great anti-bacterial agent. It also has a delightfully sweet taste.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Turmeric"}}

Turmeric

A popular Indian staple, turmeric is rich in curcumin, a compound that has anti-inflammatory properties to support strong immunity.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Brahmi"}}

Brahmi

It is an Ayurvedic herb that is known to improve brain health & lower blood pressure. It also contains antioxidants which make it a good immunity-booster.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Ajwain"}}

Ajwain

Ajwain, also known as Carom Seeds, contain active enzymes that help in the secretion of gastric juices that improve digestion and promote a better gut health.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Arjun"}}

Arjun

It is an antioxidant, anti-inflammatory, and antimicrobial agent. Arjun Chhal strengthens the heart muscles and aids its functioning.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Ashok"}}

Ashok

It has calming properties which could help in relieving painful periods. It can also strengthen the uterus and boost stamina in menstruating women.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Baheda"}}

Baheda

Baheda helps with detoxification of the liver and fights discomfort caused by stones.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Bhringraj"}}

Bhringraj

Bhringraj can activate the hair follicles, which enhances hair growth. It also increases blood circulation to the scalp and roots.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Bosswellia"}}

Bosswellia

Boswellia helps in calming inflammation and also helps in weight management by increased caloric burn.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Castor"}}

Castor

Castor Plant is the herb of choice for all kinds of vata disorders. It is widely used to maintain healthy muscles and joints.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Cinnamon"}}

Cinnamon

Cinnamon is a spice obtained from the inner bark of Cinnamomum tea. It helps control blood sugar and lowers the risk of heart disease.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Coconut"}}

Coconut

Pure coconut oil has benefits for skin and hair, and it also helps in boosting the immune system. It improves digestion and is used for weight loss as well.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Cow Milk"}}

Cow Milk

Milk is extracted from the Gir cows which is an indigenous breed in the Thar Desert of India. These cows are grass-fed and not factory farmed and free from any cross-breeding.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Cranberry"}}

Cranberry

Cranberry is a superfood which is rich in fibre and Vitamin C and is loaded up with antioxidants that prepare the body to fight against illnesses.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Darharidra"}}

Darharidra

Darharidra, also known as Indian Barberry or Tree Turmeric has anti-inflammatory and anti-fungal properties.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Dhania"}}

Dhania

Dhania or Coriander is an evergreen herb with a characteristic aroma. It is filled with fibres that improve digestion.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Erandmool"}}

Erandmool

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Garlic"}}

Garlic

Garlic is low in calories and high in nutrition. The strong taste of this herb adds a punch to your diet and lowers cholesterol.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Ginger"}}

Ginger

A flowering plant whose root is widely used as a spice and folk medicine for building immunity.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Ginseng"}}

Ginseng

Ginseng is a prominent Ayurvedic herb known to boost energy levels and fight fatigue. It also supports better protein absorption by muscles.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Gokhru"}}

Gokhru

Also known as Gokshura, Gokhru helps elevate stamina.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Garlilc"}}

Garlilc

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Green Coffee Bean"}}

Green Coffee Bean

Green coffee beans are helpful in weight management. They are rich in chlorogenic acid which is an effective fat burner.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Green Tea"}}

Green Tea

Green tea is a rich source of catechins which help you break the visceral fat in your body. The catechins also boost metabolism and break down the excess fat.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Guggul"}}

Guggul

Guggul is an Ayurvedic resin that has been used in Ayurvedic medicines for centuries due to its anti-inflammatory properties. It is known for helping to treat arthritis and improving joint flexibility.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Gymnema Sylvestre"}}

Gymnema Sylvestre

This plant stimulates insulin secretion and might help you fight sugar cravings.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Harad"}}

Harad

The healing properties of Harad help relieve burning sensation while urinating and trouble caused by abdominal gas.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Haritaki"}}

Haritaki

Combating indigestion and constipation, this herb supports your digestive system.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Hing"}}

Hing

Hing works wonderfully in improving digestion. It can help you keep bloating and gas at bay!

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Indian Bael"}}

Indian Bael

An ancient Indian herb, it is anti-inflammatory in nature and has antioxidant properties. It is used in relieving cold, cough and boosting immunity.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Jamun Seeds"}}

Jamun Seeds

Jamun or black plum is a nutritious fruit, however major of its medicinal benefits are in its seed. It helps in regulating blood sugar levels.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Jeera"}}

Jeera

Jeera, also known as Cumin Seeds, helps in speeding up the production of bile acids in Liver to digest fats and help in overall digestion.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Kalmegh"}}

Kalmegh

Kalmegh is also known as the “King of Bitters” and is bitter in taste. It is mainly used for liver problems as it protects the liver against damage caused by free radicals due to its antioxidant and anti-inflammatory activity.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Kaunch Beej"}}

Kaunch Beej

Kaunch beej is the seed of Kapikacchu herb which has numerous health benefits. It is rich in antioxidants and protein that boost your stamina.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Khus"}}

Khus

Khus is an Ayurvedic ingredient that might help to reduce the symptoms of piles. It improves digestion and reduces the burning and pain while passing stools.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Kutki"}}

Kutki

Kutki is a traditional Ayurvedic herb which has hepatoprotective, detoxifying and anti-inflammatory properties. These properties collectively help to keep liver health in check.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Lodhra"}}

Lodhra

This herb has astringent and hemostatic properties that could help to control heavy menstrual bleeding.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Manjistha"}}

Manjistha

A famous herb for blood detoxification, Manjistha flushes toxins out of the body.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Methi"}}

Methi

Fenugreek seeds are high in soluble fiber. It helps manage sugar by slowing down digestion and absorption of carbs

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Milk Thistle"}}

Milk Thistle

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Mulethi"}}

Mulethi

It has antispasmodic properties that help to relax muscles. Thus, this herb could effectively comfort you during your periods.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Mustard"}}

Mustard

Mustard Oil is one of the healthy options to be used for cooking as it is beneficial in many ways. People suffering from heart ailments, Arthritis, or experiencing issues with their skin and hair, find this oil very beneficial.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Nagkeshwar"}}

Nagkeshwar

Nagkeshar is also known as Ironwood is an Ayurvedic herb that is used to treat piles and abnormal bleeding from the uterus.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Papaya"}}

Papaya

Papaya leaves have therapeutic properties that help prepare the body and shield them against these diseases. They also act as cleansing agents for the liver and maintains healthy functioning of the same.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Pashan Bedh"}}

Pashan Bedh

Popular for its diuretic properties, Pashan Bedh is widely used to treat renal problems. It also helps alleviate the symptoms of kidney stones.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Rasna"}}

Rasna

This Ayurvedic herb is used to treat Vata issues. It helps nourish the skin and tissue layers thereby reducing inflammation. Also, it acts as an analgesic and helps alleviate dryness in joints, subsequently improving joint mobility.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Rose"}}

Rose

Rose is rich in polyphenols, that helps in reducing UV induced skin damage, and hydrates the skin from within

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Safed Musli"}}

Safed Musli

Safed Musli is used in traditional systems of Ayurveda. It can boost your stamina, vitality, and performance.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "San Beej"}}

San Beej

San Beej or Flax Seeds are superfoods with high Omega-3 healthy fats and may have a mild laxative effect.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Sandalwood"}}

Sandalwood

Sandalwood and its oil have been used as a traditional medicine in Ayurveda to fight the cold, digestive disorders, and muscle disorders. This oil is also used in aromatherapy as it has calming properties that help combat stress.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Sarpagandha"}}

Sarpagandha

This his ayurvedic herb helps in relaxing blood vessels & regulating nerve function in the muscles leading to the heart, thereby lowering blood pressure and improving sound sleep.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Sesame Seed"}}

Sesame Seed

Sesame oil is a healthy oil enriched with Omega-6 fatty acids. It has antioxidant and anti-inflammatory properties which makes it beneficial for heart and skin health.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Shankhpushpi"}}

Shankhpushpi

A herb that is popular in Ayurvedic Medicine, Shankhpushpi is a blood purifier. It also boosts memory and improves focus.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Shatavari"}}

Shatavari

Shatavari increases Glutathione synthesis that leads to a brighter skin, and boosts skin hydration

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Spirulina"}}

Spirulina

Spirulina contains high levels of iron, thus increasing the production of red blood cells that promote the circulation of oxygen and gives an instant energy boost.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Tagara"}}

Tagara

Scientifically known as Valeriana Wallichii, this Ayurvedic herb helps combat psychological and digestive disorders. It calms the mind and prevents convulsions, thus helping you sleep better.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "White Musli"}}

White Musli

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Kesar"}}

Kesar

Kapiva Kashmiri Kesar is 100% natural and handpicked from the lush fields of Pampore.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Pomegranate"}}

Pomegranate

Pomegranate is rich in Vitamin C, that helps in boosting collagen production, and fights hyperpigmentation

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Arjuna"}}

Arjuna

Arjuna helps in strengthening the heart muscles & has anti-hypertensive property that helps reduce the levels of high blood pressure

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Lahsun"}}

Lahsun

Lahsun (Garlic) helps in improving cardiovascular health by reducing arterial stiffness, elevated cholesterol levels and high blood pressure.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Swarna Bhasma"}}

Swarna Bhasma

Swarna Bhasma: 24 Karat Gold made with special Ayurvedic Marana Process.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Gokshura"}}

Gokshura

Gokshura Helps in muscle recovery & improves physical strength.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Black Musli"}}

Black Musli

Black Musli Helps in tissue rejuvenation & is a rare herb which is a very potent aphrodisiac. Please find the ingredient image attached with this Task.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Brahmi Oil"}}

Brahmi Oil

Brahmi Oil Creates a natural protective layer around hair follicles to keep the fibers healthy, reducing split ends, & making the entire mane lustrous.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Kalonji"}}

Kalonji

Kalonji Contains omega-3 & 6, encouraging blood circulation, especially in the head. It is known to promote rapid hair growth within weeks.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Hibiscus"}}

Hibiscus

Hibiscus contains amino acids that stimulate keratin production in the cells of your hair follicles, encouraging healthy hair growth.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Guggulu"}}

Guggulu

Guggulu Provides relief from painful urination due to its analgesic, anti- inflammatory, anti-microbial properties.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Punarnava"}}

Punarnava

Punarnava Helps in removing toxins from the body due to diuretic properties.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Shweta Parpati"}}

Shweta Parpati

Shweta Parpati improves urine flow and reduces burning sensation during urination.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Methika"}}

Methika

Methika helps in reducing the size of cysts.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Kachnar"}}

Kachnar

Kachnar Helps in balancing hormones.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Vijayasar"}}

Vijayasar

Reduces diabetes-related symptoms like frequent urination, fatigue, joint pain etc due to its diuretic properties. It also helps in improving the health of ovaries.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Gajar Beej"}}

Gajar Beej

Gajar Beej Helps relieve pain and induces periods.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Kachha Aam"}}

Kachha Aam

Kachha Aam Keeps body cool and hydrated.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Cumin (Jeera)"}}

Cumin (Jeera)

Cumin (Jeera) Improves digestion and gut health.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Mint (Pudina)"}}

Mint (Pudina)

Mint (Pudina) Reduces body heat naturally.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Turmeric"}}

Turmeric

Turmeric Builds immunity.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Ashwagandha"}}

Ashwagandha

Ashwagandha protects against telomere loss & potentially delays aging.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Bakuchi Oil"}}

Bakuchi Oil

Bakuchi Oil improves skin health without the usual retinol-therapy side effects.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Chirata Actives"}}

Chirata Actives

Chirata Actives bioactive that stimulates stem cells, growth factor production & epidermis regeneration in 7 days.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Apricot Oil"}}

Apricot Oil

Apricot Oil has triglycerides, phospholipids, FFAs, phenolic compounds, & antioxidants for skin wellness.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Kumkumadi Tailam"}}

Kumkumadi Tailam

Kumkumadi Tailam is an Ayurvedic product which is excellent for skin treatment especially for skin lightening.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Jojoba Seed oil"}}

Jojoba Seed oil

Jojoba Seed oil helps increase skin luminosity and decreases redness just 1hr after application.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Green Tea"}}

Green Tea

Green Tea contributes to skin lightening due to the presence of antioxidants which benefits skin complexion.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Shata Dhauta Ghee"}}

Shata Dhauta Ghee

Shata Dhauta Ghee is high in glycerol, rich in Omega 3, 9 fatty acids, Vitamin A, D, E & K. Provides deep moisturization.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Raktachandan"}}

Raktachandan

Raktachandan is a rare ingredient, potent in antioxidants for radiance & an even skin tone.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Almond Oil"}}

Almond Oil

Almond Oil has Vitamin E with antioxidant properties, prevents cell damage & reduces UV damage.

{{/if}} {{#if value '===' "Kumkumadi oil"}}

Kumkumadi oil

Kumkumadi oil has higher bioactive content compared to other kesar variants.

{{/if}} {{/if}} {{/each}}
